snippet: The authorities found clandestine graves containing several bodies Saturday near a southern Mexico town where students at a teachers college clashed with the police a week ago.
abstract: Mexican authorities find clandestine graves containing several bodies close to where students clashed with police, leaving several people dead and up to 43 students missing; DNA analysis and other other tests are being conducted to identify the remains; witnesses of confrontation say they saw police officers taking several of the bodies away; officials are bracing for prospect of one of largest massacres in recent years.
lead_paragraph: The authorities found clandestine graves containing several bodies Saturday near a southern Mexico town where students at a teachers college clashed with the police a week ago.

headline.main: Bodies Are Found Close to Where Missing Students Clashed With Police in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Bodies Are Found Close to Where Missing Students Clashed With Police in Mexico
